title: Ethnobotanical study and vulnerability of medicinal plants used against the symptoms of COVID-19 in the Lomi√© subdivision, East Region of Cameroon
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Karimou Ngamsou Abdel, William Armand Mala, Pierre Marie Chimi, Forbi Preasious Funwi, Constantin Engoulou, Joseph Achille Messi Effa, Michele Elodie Kouoguem Kamdem, Fabrice Nzoyeuem Djonko, Ulrich Landry Fokoua, Samuel Brice Adounga, Marie Marguerite Mbolo
